thread.title: BREAKING: Donald Trump hails Brexit as chance for Britain to 'TAKE BACK CONTROL'
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Donald Trump hails Brexit as chance for Britain to 'TAKE BACK CONTROL'

title: BREAKING: Donald Trump hails Brexit as chance for Britain to 'TAKE BACK CONTROL'
text:
BREAKING: Donald Trump hails Brexit as chance for Britain to 'TAKE BACK CONTROL' BREAKING: Donald Trump hails Brexit as chance for Britain to 'TAKE BACK CONTROL' PRESIDENT Donald Trump has heralded Brexit as a chance for Britons to “take back control of their lives”. PUBLISHED: 00:06, Sun, Feb 19, 2017 | UPDATED: 00:07, Sun, Feb 19, 2017 REUTERS Donald Trump has applauded Britain for 
Speaking to supporters at a major rally in Melbourne, Florida, Trump said the incredible movement of populism which was "sweeping” the United States is also “sweeping the globe”. 
The 70-year-old said: “You’re all part of this incredible movement. This movement that’s been written about on every magazine all over the world. 
“A movement that is sweeping across our country, it’s sweeping frankly across the globe. Look at Brexit, look at Brexit. REUTERS Donald Trump promised to filter out fake news during his "Make America Great Again rally" 
“It’s a much smaller example, but its still something you can look at. 
“People want to take back control of their countries, and they want to take back control of their lives and the lives of their families.” 
Reflecting on his inauguration speech when he promised to put "America first”, the US President said the "nation-state" remains best model for human happiness. 
More to follow...
